<COOLEDNODES><INFO sitename="Everything" site="http://everything2.com/" servertime="Wed Oct 10 19:30:05 2012">Rendered by the Cool Nodes XML Ticker</INFO> <cooled cooledby_user="Jet-Poop" node_id="2070852" parent_e2node="1843986" author_user="haqiqat">I was burned and bleeding, but the galaxy still spun on</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Aerobe" node_id="2069826" parent_e2node="2070845" author_user="Uberbanana">Sex House</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="GhettoAardvark" node_id="2070806" parent_e2node="2070826" author_user="sam512">Time travel in Looper</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="moeyz" node_id="2070898" parent_e2node="2070900" author_user="raincomplex">Alik' Plantman</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="locke baron" node_id="2069282" parent_e2node="2070905" author_user="Zephronias">Mia's Bad Night</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Intentions" node_id="1528620" parent_e2node="1517195" author_user="kasuma">Completely implausible circumstances, even by comic book standards</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Pandeism Fish" node_id="2070877" parent_e2node="2070876" author_user="Hazelnut">People today are too easily butthurt</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="wertperch" node_id="2066931" parent_e2node="2066933" author_user="VicimusGegan">Used book stores, I love you. I am unwilling to let you go.</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Transitional Man" node_id="2070880" parent_e2node="2070793" author_user="The Custodian">October 8, 2012</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Auspice" node_id="2070859" parent_e2node="2070858" author_user="Jet-Poop">A Nightmare on Defender Street</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="jessicaj" node_id="1738673" parent_e2node="378266" author_user="enth">Meatball</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="bexxta" node_id="2070789" parent_e2node="2070780" author_user="Tem42">Dutton Books</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="wertperch" node_id="1970948" parent_e2node="1970947" author_user="DylanDog">Idiocracy</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="moeyz" node_id="2070855" parent_e2node="2070854" author_user="borgo">Shore Road Park</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="wertperch" node_id="2070751" parent_e2node="2070817" author_user="Chord">Life Grows Back</cooled>
</COOLEDNODES>
